products.name: Urban Explorer Jacket
products.description: A stylish and waterproof jacket, perfect for city life and outdoor adventures. Features multiple pockets and a breathable inner lining.

products.name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
products.description: Immerse yourself in sound with these high-fidelity headphones. 30-hour battery life and crystal-clear microphone.

products.name: Artisan Ceramic Mug
products.description: Hand-crafted ceramic mug with a unique glaze finish. Perfect for your morning coffee or tea. Holds 12oz.

products.name: Minimalist Leather Wallet
products.description: A slim, minimalist wallet made from full-grain leather. Holds up to 8 cards and cash without the bulk.

products.name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: A classic crewneck t-shirt made from 100% organic cotton. Soft, breathable, and ethically made.

products.name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Compact yet powerful portable speaker with a 15-hour battery life and waterproof design.
